post.content:
Crystal Dynamics has plans to unify Lara Croft’s two canonical timelines because the Tomb Raider franchise observes its 25th anniversary, the studio stated in a Twitter video Wednesday afternoon.

Authentic celebrations of Tomb Raider’s silver anniversary will launch Feb. 1, stated Meagan Marie, Crystal Dynamics’ neighborhood manager. Marie also pointed to the Tomb Raider Netflix sharp series, announced Wednesday, which also threads into this legitimate, unified timeline. The Tomb Raider anime is determined after the events of the video sport reboot trilogy, which comprises 2013’s Tomb Raider, 2015’s Upward push of the Tomb Raider, and 2018’s Shadow of the Tomb Raider.

Down the avenue, stated franchise sport director Will Kerslake, “We envision a model forward for Tomb Raider unfolding after these established adventures” — relating to both the Core Assemble-developed games (1996’s Tomb Raider by 2003’s Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness) and the series in the fingers of Crystal Dynamics since 2006’s Tomb Raider: Story.

Even supposing Crystal Dynamics has no main sport announcement to dangle “in the conclude to future,” the studio is “working to unify these timelines,” Kerslake stated.

“With Tomb Raider’s intensive ancient previous, here is not a easy task, and we ask for your patience as we battle by the enchancment path of,” he added.
post.title: Lara Croft’s two timelines will be unified, says Tomb Raider studio
